title: Intellectual Fascia
author: Not specified in the provided text.
date_published: Not specified in the provided text.
dek: Academic papers often rely on implicit knowledge and unspoken assumptions, creating a "intellectual fascia" that binds a research community.  This unwritten knowledge, encompassing experimental design choices, benchmark limitations, and the iterative nature of research, is crucial for understanding and contributing to the field but rarely explicitly documented.  Acculturation within academia involves learning this unspoken knowledge.
